description.original: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance
description.translation: 将 “页面预览 ”悬停弹出窗口转化为完全可用的编辑器实例

dict.text:`Consider adding CSS \"touch-action: text:`考虑将CSS“touch-action:none” 添加到此元素`
dict.text:'Consider adding CSS \"box-sizing:: text:'考虑将 CSS "box-sizing: border-box" 添加到此元素'
dict..setName(\"Trigger hover preview on sub-: .setName("在子标题链接上触发悬停预览")
dict..setDesc(\"Allow hover preview to trigge: .setDesc("允许将鼠标悬停在任何类型的渲染嵌入（例如图像或块引用）上时触发悬停预览")
dict..setDesc(\"When double clicking to minim: .setDesc("双击最小化时，窗口会向下滚动而不是向上滚动")
dict..setDesc(\"How long to wait before closi: .setDesc("鼠标离开后要等待多长时间才能关闭 Hover Editor")
dict..setDesc(\"Use hover editor for links to: .setDesc("对副标题链接使用Hover Editor，而不是内置预览/编辑器")
.setDesc("对区块链接使用Hover Editor，而不是内置预览/编辑器")
dict..setDesc(`Show the view header by defaul:
.setDesc(`触发Hover Editor时默认显示视图标题。
         禁用时，只有点击最小化按钮左侧的视图标题图标后才会显示出视图标题。`)
dict..setDesc(`Click and hold an image within: .setDesc(`点击并按住Hover Editor中的图片，可暂时最大化弹出窗口和图片，使其充满整个视口.        当鼠标向上移动时，Hover Editor将恢复到原来的大小.`)
dict.name:\"Open link under cursor in new Hov: name:"在新的Hover Editor中打开光标下的链接"
dict.name:\"Open current file in new Hover Ed: name:"在新的Hover Editor中打开当前文件"
dict.name:\"Convert active pane to Hover Edit: name:"将活动窗格转换为Hover Editor"
dict.name:\"Dock active Hover Editor to works: name:"将 Hover Editor 停靠到工作区"
dict.text:\"There are no listeners set for th: text:"此操作没有设置监听器"
dict..setDesc(\"Use hover editor for footnote: .setDesc("为脚注使用Hover Editor，而不是内置预览/编辑器")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the hover editor as the a: .setDesc("将Hover Editor设置为打开时的活动窗格")
dict..setDesc(\"How long to wait before showi: .setDesc("当鼠标悬停在链接上时，显示Hover Editor需要等待多长时间")
dict..setDesc(`Quickly arrange popovers by dr: .setDesc(`将弹出窗口拖至屏幕边缘即可快速排列。
dict.will maximize the popover vertically. Th: 拖至屏幕左侧或右侧边缘可以使其垂直最大化，拖至顶部边缘可以使其填满整个屏幕，
dict.screen. Dragging the popovers away from: 将弹出窗口从边缘拖离可以使其恢复到原始大小。
